itemDescription: British mathematician and Professor at the University of Warwick

wikipedia_page.main: Keith Martin Ball FRS FRSE (born 26 December 1960) is a mathematician and professor at the University of Warwick. He was scientific director of the International Centre for Mathematical Sciences (ICMS) from 2010 to 2014.

response: *1960 – Keith Martin Ball, American mathematician and academic
